title: Unable to drag items to items sets
body: I am on a Mac, and unsure what has changed. I am no longer able to drag items to existing to new item sets. I also cannot find these any where in my files. I have read these are stored server side now, so I am unsure what is wrong with client that I can no longer create or edit item sets. Any thoughts and help appreciated.

replies.body:
This is a bug we've been seeing for players that have upgraded to macOS Sierra. At the moment there's no fix, so I recommend updating your item sets from another PC running League until a fix rolls out. Since Item sets are saved server-side, you should see any changes made to them from another PC show up on your Mac. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
is there a fix yet mate
Same Problem here on different Macs. A bug in the mac client. Hopefully Riot Games will fix this soon...
I also am having this issue. Please squash bug :)

Still an issue as of the latest patch. Has this been prioritized to be addressed or should I determine another way to plan my item sets? I do not have the luxury of having a second computer to do item sets in currently. Thank you.
